tit.j: きっづ光科学館ふぉとん
tit.e: The Kids' Science Museum of Photons
The Kids' Science Museum of Photons
The Kids' Science Museum of Photons

sen.j: きっづ光科学館ふぉとん（きっづひかりかがくかんふぉとん）は関西文化学術研究都市にある光に関する日本ではじめての科学館である。
sen.e: The Kids' Science Museum of Photons which is located in the Kansai Science City is the first science museum for photons in Japan.
The Kids' Science Museum of Photons which is located in Kansai Science City is the first science museum for photons in Japan.
The Kids' Science Museum of Photons which is located in Kansai Science City is the first science museum for photons in Japan.
It was established in 2001.
It was established in 2001.
It was established in 2001.

sen.j: 名称の「きっづ」は「kids(子供)」と所在地である「木津」に、「ふぉとん」は光子を意味する「フォトン(Photon)」に由来する。
sen.e: While 'Kizzu' of the museum's name' derives from 'Kids (children)' and the name of the location 'Kizu,' 'Foton' from 'Photon' which means photon.
While 'Kizzu' of the museum's name' derives from 'Kids (children)' and the name of the location 'Kizu,' 'Foton' from 'Photon' which means photon.
While 'Kizzu' of the museum's name derives from 'Kids (children)' and the name of the location 'Kizu,' 'Foton' from 'Photon' which means photon.

sen.j: 身近なものでありながら、さまざまな不思議に満ちた「光」をテーマにしており、光の不思議を体験し、光の基本的な性質から最先端の光の利用技術まで、楽しみながら学ぶことができる。
sen.e: This museum takes up as theme 'Light' which is something familiar to human beings but full of wide-ranging wonders, so everybody can experience wonders of the light and enjoy and learn the basic nature of the light to the state-of-the-art technologies to utilize the light.

This museum takes up as a theme 'Light' which is something familiar to human beings but full of wide-ranging wonders, so everybody can experience wonders of the light and enjoy and learn the basic nature of the light to the state-of-the-art technologies that utilize the light.

This museum takes up as a theme 'Light' which is something familiar to human beings but full of wide-ranging wonders, so everybody can experience wonders of the light and enjoy and learn the basic nature of the light to the state-of-the-art technologies that utilize the light.

sen.j: 光の歴史や科学技術に関する展示のほか、全天周映像ホールではクイズなどを通じて来館者が体験参加できる。
sen.e: There are exhibits on the history and the scientific technologies of the light and also a full dome video projection hall where visitors are allowed to participate in and experience attractions through puzzles and so on.
sen.cmt: 「全天周映像ホール」＝「fulldome video projection hall」は、下記サイトを参考にしました。http://www.goto.co.jp/english/topics/2009/topics_090415.html
sen.e: There are exhibits on the history and scientific technologies of light and also a full dome video projection hall where visitors are allowed to participate in and experience attractions through puzzles and so on.

There are exhibits on the history and scientific technologies of light and also a full dome video projection hall where visitors are allowed to participate in and experience attractions through puzzles and so on.

sen.j: また、光に関する演示実験などを行う「レーザーラボ」や、工作教室なども実施されている。
sen.e: There are also 'Laser lab' where demonstration experiments, etc. on the light are conducted and workshop where manual work can be done, and so on.
There is also a 'Laser lab' where demonstration experiments, etc. on light are conducted and workshops where manual work can be done, and so on.
There is also a 'Laser lab' where demonstration experiments, etc. on light are conducted and workshops where manual work can be done, and so on.

sen.j: 春休みや夏休みなどには特別イベントが開催され、常設展示では扱うことのできない科学技術や光に関する実験・工作が体験できる。
sen.e: During spring and summer holidays, special events are held, where scientific technologies, experiments/manual work on the light which cannot be dealt with in the permanent exhibits can be experienced.
During spring and summer holidays, special events are held, where scientific technologies, experiments/manual work on light which cannot be dealt with in the permanent exhibits can be experienced.
During spring and summer holidays, special events are held, where scientific technologies, experiments/manual work on light which cannot be dealt with in the permanent exhibits can be experienced.

sen.j: また、小学生や中学生を対象としたサイエンスクラブがあり、1年間を通じたグループ研究活動などが行われている。
sen.e: The museum keeps a science club for elementary school pupils and junior high students, where full-year group research activities and so on are conducted.
The museum keeps a science club for elementary school pupils and junior high students, where full-year group research activities and so on are conducted.
The museum keeps a science club for elementary school pupils and junior high students, where full-year group research activities and so on are conducted.

sen.j: 休館日
sen.e: Closed
sen.cmt: 以下、下記サイト（東京国立博物館）を参考にしました。http://www.tnm.go.jp/en/guide/general/index.html#jikan
sen.e: Closed
Closed

sen.j: 月曜日（祝日・振替休日の場合はその翌日）
sen.e: Mondays (except for National Holidays/substitute public holidays on Monday, in which case the museum is open on the holiday and closed the following Tuesday instead)
Mondays (except for National Holidays/substitute public holidays on Monday, in which case the museum is open on the holiday and closed the following Tuesday instead)
Mondays (except for National Holidays/substitute public holidays on Monday, in which case the museum is open on the holiday and closed the following Tuesday instead)

In addition, temporary closure may take place.

sen.j: 入館料
sen.e: Admissions
Admissions
Admissions

sen.j: 団体は20名以上。
sen.e: Those in groups are to be 20 or more.
Those in groups are to be 20 or more.
Those in groups are to be 20 or more.

sen.j: また、幼児や学校教育の一環としての見学などに対する入館料免除がある。
sen.e: Free admission may apply for infants and those in tours as part of the school education.
Free admission may apply for infants and those in tours as part of school education.
Free admission may apply for infants and those in tours as part of school education.

sen.j: 「木津南ソレイユ」より徒歩約1分
sen.e: Approx. one-minute walk from 'Kizu-minami Soleil'
Approx. one-minute walk from 'Kizu-minami Soleil'
Approx. one-minute walk from 'Kizu-minami Soleil'
